name: play
description: Play interactive text adventure games in Slack

commands.name: <command to send to the game>
commands.description: How you interact with the game. 'look', 'north', etc.

commands.name: list games
commands.description: Browse a list of games to play (organized by category)

commands.name: save
commands.description: Save current game state to a gist

commands.name: load <save game id>
commands.description: Load a saved game state and start game (given a save game id)

commands.name: restart
commands.description: Abandon current game state and restart from scratch
